This software is designed to optimize performance and provide a smooth user experience. Anchoring the budget smartphone are 128GB 6GB RAM, 128GB 8GB RAM, and 256GB 8GB RAM internal storage variants—notably, this handset (your pic from the selection) supports MicroSD (shared SIM slot).Capture decent photos and 1080p pictures with the 108MP+2MP+2MP primary camera set up at the rear end of the phone and the 20MP front-end lens for selfies. The 4G-enabled handset has Bluetooth 5.3 for seamless and fast pairing with your other Bluetooth devices (smartwatch, Buds, TV, etc). For wifi, Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac, dual-band, Wi-Fi Direct offers quick and safe connectivity once connected to a reliable internet source. Besides Wi-Fi and Bluetooth, you can connect to other devices and transfer data using NFC, an Infrared port, and USB Type-C 2.0 OTG.The handset’s massive 5,500mAh battery enables at least 1.5 days of typical use before recharging. Recharge on the go with the fast 33W wired charger.

It was released in 2024, on May 31. Honor 200 has 6.7 inch, OLED, 1B colors, 120Hz, HDR, 4000 nits (peak), a resolution of 1200 x 2664 pixels screen. It uses Qualcomm SM7550-AB Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 (4 nm) chipset, Octa-core (1×2.63 GHz Cortex-A715 & 4×2.4 GHz Cortex-A715 & 3×1.8 GHz Cortex-A510) CPU, Adreno 720 GPU. Honor 200 supports 2G, 3G, 4G, 5G networks with Dual SIM (Nano-SIM, dual stand-by). Honor 200 5G has 5MP Triple main camera, 5MP Single selfie camera. It uses 5200 mAh, non-removable battery.Display:6.7 inches OLED Capacitive Touchscreen, 1B colors supported punch hole display phone has a resolution of 1200 x 2664 pixels with a PPI of 436.Body and sensors:Made of a glass front, plastic frame, and plastic back, the mobile is 161.5 mm in height, 74.6 mm wide, and 7.7 mm in thickness. It weighs 187 g available. The mobile is available in 4 colors on the market. The colors are Black, Silver, Blue & Pink. Being a sensor accelerometer, gyro, compass, ultrasound proximity, and light sensor. The under-display, optical fingerprint runs quite accurately fast. Face unlock is correct & secured.Network:The phone has supported 2G, 3G, 4G, and 5G Network facilities. Moreover, GPRS and EDGE facilities also have. HSPA 42.2/5.76 Mbps, LTE-A, 5G speed on the phone.Performance:Android 14 Operating system and Qualcomm SM7550-AB Snapdragon 7 Gen 3 (4 nm), Octa-core (1×2.63 GHz Cortex-A715 & 4×2.4 GHz Cortex-A715 & 3×1.8 GHz Cortex-A510) processor on the phone.RAM and ROM:The company has launched the phone in 5 variants of 8GB/256GB, 12GB/256GB, 16GB/256GB, 12GB/512GB & 16GB/512GB. In the case of gaming, graphics, and RAM are fairly good. FHD-quality graphics games can be easily run and played quite smoothly.Camera:The Honor 200 is well-equipped in the camera department. The 50MP primary camera is coupled with the 1/1.56” Sony IMX906 sensor with OIS support. Moreover, it also houses a telephoto lens as well as an ultrawide/macro camera as auxiliary units. The former is a 50MP shooter with the Sony IMX856 sensor while the latter is a 12MP snapper. In the meantime, the front camera is also a 50MP unit.The Back of the phone has a 50MP+50MP+12MP camera with which you can record beautiful quality pictures and a maximum of 4k@30fps video. Moreover, it remains an extra feature like The phone has a 50MP selfie camera with which you can take beautiful quality pictures and selfies. You can record a maximum of 4k@30fps video with the front camera. High–quality selfie work can be done effortlessly with the camera on the phone.Battery:This phone packs a large 5,200 mAh battery with 100W wired charging support. The cell in the Honor 200 is the company’s silicon-carbon battery that offers a leading level of endurance. With this, you can get an average of up to 110 hours of standby time, and 13 hours of net browsing. At full charge, you can talk for up to 35 hours on 2G. The phone will take about 27 minutes with 100W supper fast charging to fully charge.

non-removableCharging45W wired, PD3.0MISCELLANEOUSColorsBlack, White, Purple, Green Redmi Note 14 Pro Review DetailsXiaomi Redmi Note 14 Pro 5G is a smartphone that runs on Android 14. It was released on 2024, September 26. Redmi Note 14 Pro has 6.67 inch, AMOLED, 68B colors, 120Hz, HDR10+, Dolby Vision, 3000 nits (peak), a resolution of 1220 x 2712 pixels screen with Corning Gorilla Glass Victus 2. Note 14 Pro uses Mediatek Dimensity 7300 Ultra (4 nm) chipset, Octa-core (4×2.5 GHz Cortex-A78 & 4×2.0 GHz Cortex-A55) CPU, Mali-G615 MC2 GPU. It supports 2G, 3G, 4G, 5G networks with Nano-SIM, eSIM or Dual SIM (Nano-SIM, dual stand-by). Redmi Note 14 Pro has 5MP Triple main camera, 2MP Single selfie camera. It uses 5500 mAh, non-removable battery.Design and DisplayRight from the get-go, it is pretty clear that Redmi Note 14 Pro is trying to emulate what the higher-end Note offering did last year. Among the available designs, a single purple colour option sticks out the most with a vegan leather finish — similar to the Note 13 Pro+! Additionally, the phone comes with IP68 water and dust resistance — pretty reminiscent of you know which phone. It also dons a Corning Gorilla Glass Victus 2 on the front adding to its toughness. The overall design has been overhauled with a reshaped and relocated camera island.We are getting a 6.67-inch 12-bit OLED screen with 1.5K resolution on this phone. Moreover, it is capable of up to 120Hz refresh rate, 3,000 nits peak brightness, and 480Hz touch sampling rate. In the meantime, the instantaneous touch sampling rate on the Redmi Note 14 Pro is much higher at 2,560Hz. Not only that, it also offers wet hands touch support, 1,920Hz PWM dimming, DCI-P3 colour gamut, HDR10+ and has a triple certification from TÜV Rheinland for eye protection features.PerformanceAlong with the aesthetic, the Redmi Note 14 Pro gets an upgrade on the performance side of things as well. Firstly, the new phone houses the MediaTek Dimensity 7300 Ultra, which is decently better than the Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 on its predecessor. It is also available in wider configurations, those being: 8GB + 128GB, 8GB + 256GB, 12GB + 256GB, and 12GB + 512GB. Likewise, the battery has beefed up to 5,500 mAh compared to 5,100 mAh last year. However, the charging speed has dropped to 45W from 67W, which is still plenty fast.Camera and the restThe camera department gets some adjustments too. Instead of going for a big 200MP sensor, Xiaomi has kept it simple with a 50MP shooter. The sensor size has shrunken too, with a 1/1.96-inch unit this time, while previously there was a much larger 1/1.4-inch sensor. It is a LYT-600 sensor from Sony though, which is also present on the Redmi Note 14 5G. While the camera appears to be a downgrade on paper, we can only tell for certain once we test it hands-on. Other than that, the auxiliary lenses remain unchanged with an 8MP ultrawide and a 2MP macro shooter. Meanwhile, the selfie snapper is now a 20MP unit instead of the 16MP on the previous iteration.The Redmi Note 14 Pro supports dual SIM 5G cellular and dual-band WiFi 6 connectivity. Furthermore, you get Bluetooth v5.4 alongside high-quality codecs like LDAC and LHDC-V. There is also NFC, five-way navigation support and IR blaster as additional wireless connectivity options. Other than that, there is a stereo speaker setup and an X-axis linear motor to enhance the gaming and multimedia experience.

details.description_text: The Honor X9c is a durable smartphone with many features built into this device which makes it very capable of delivering good performance. It has a large 6.78 inches AMOLED display with a 1224 x 2700 pixels screen resolution and 120Hz refresh rate. The phone is running on Qualcomm SM5350-AB Snapdragon 6 Gen 1 chipset. Honor X9c has a main camera of 108MP with OIS and 5MP ultra-wide lens.The front facing camera is a 16MP wide lens. These include a 6,600mAh battery charging capability which is fast charging at 66W. Also, the Honor X9c offers the dust and water resistance rating of IP65M. It comes in three colors: Three models: Jade Cyan, Titanium Black, and Titanium Purple. The Honor X9c price in Bangladesh is BDT 44,999 (Official) for 12GB of RAM and 256GB of phone storage.Honor X9c The Honor X9c is a durable smartphone with many features built into this device which makes it very capable of delivering good performance. The Honor X5b Plus is an affordable, high-performance smartphone offering a sleek design, advanced camera system, and reliable battery life, making it a fantastic choice for users seeking excellent value for money.Sleek Design and BuildThe Honor X5b Plus is designed for style and durability. With dimensions of 163.32 x 75.07 x 8.35 mm and a weight of approximately 188g, this phone provides a comfortable and solid feel. It features a glass front, plastic back, and plastic frame. The IP64 rating ensures it is dust and water-resistant, adding extra durability for everyday use.Immersive DisplayEnjoy vibrant visuals with the 6.56-inch TFT LCD display that supports 16.7 million colors and a 90Hz refresh rate. The screen offers a resolution of 720 x 1612 pixels, delivering crisp and clear images. The water drop screen design ensures an immersive viewing experience, perfect for watching videos, browsing, and gaming.Efficient PerformancePowered by the MediaTek Helio G36 chipset, the Honor X5b Plus ensures smooth multitasking and efficient performance. Its Octa-core CPU (4x Cortex-A53 up to 2.2GHz and 4x Cortex-A53 up to 1.6GHz) and IMG GE8320 GPU deliver impressive results for everyday tasks and light gaming. It runs on MagicOS 7.1, based on Android 13, offering a smooth, user-friendly interface.Ample Storage OptionsThe Honor X5b Plus comes with 4GB RAM and 64GB internal storage, offering sufficient space for apps, photos, and videos. If you need more space, the phone also supports microSDXC storage expansion, allowing you to store more content with ease.Advanced Camera SystemThe 50 MP main camera with an f/1.8 aperture delivers sharp and vibrant photos. It also features a depth camera with an f/2.4 aperture to add depth to your shots. The LED flash and panorama mode enhance your photography experience in various lighting conditions.Selfie Camera: The 5 MP front camera with an f/2.2 aperture ensures clear selfies and supports video calls with ease. To buy more Apple items, visit our website and find the Apple brand.Apple iPhone 16 Pro MaxApple’s latest flagship, the iPhone 16 Pro Max, has taken the smartphone world by storm. With unmatched features, an advanced camera system, and cutting-edge performance, the iPhone 16 Pro Max is a device that’s hard to ignore. For tech enthusiasts in Bangladesh, the big question is: what’s the price of this premium device, and is it worth the investment? Let’s explore everything you need to know about the iPhone 16 Pro Max, including its features, pricing, and where you can buy it in Bangladesh.The iPhone 16 Pro Max is not just another smartphone; it’s a statement of luxury and innovation. Apple has once again pushed the boundaries of what a smartphone can do, integrating powerful new features and sleek design upgrades that make this model stand out. From the best camera Apple phone yet to exceptional battery life, the iPhone 16 Pro Max is a powerhouse.Design and Build QualityApple has maintained its reputation for stunning designs with the iPhone 16 Pro Max. The device features a robust build with a surgical-grade stainless steel frame and a ceramic shield front cover that enhances durability. Available in a new array of colors, including Deep Blue, Graphite, and Silver, it offers a sophisticated look that appeals to style-conscious consumers.Display: Bigger, Brighter, and BetterThe iPhone 16 Pro Max boasts a massive 6.9-inch Super Retina XDR display, making it the largest screen Apple has ever put on an iPhone. The OLED technology provides stunning color accuracy and true blacks, enhancing the viewing experience. With ProMotion technology, the display supports a 120Hz refresh rate, delivering silky-smooth visuals, whether you’re gaming, scrolling, or watching videos.Performance and ChipsetPowered by the A17 Bionic chip, the iPhone 16 Pro Max offers unmatched performance. This latest chipset is designed to handle the most demanding tasks with ease, from high-end gaming to video editing. details.description_text: Display: 6.88 inch | IPS LCD Processor : Unisoc T7250 Camera : 32+0.08MP + 8.0 MP Features: Side-mounted fingerprint Sensor SpecificationDisplaySize6.88 inchTypeIPS LCDResolution720 x 1640 pixelsRefresh Rate120 HzProcessorChipsetUnisoc T7250CPU TypeOcta-core (2×1.8 GHz Cortex-A75 & 6×1.6 GHz Cortex-A55)CPU Speed1.8 GHzGPUMali-G57 MP1MemoryRAM6GBROM128GBRear CameraResolution32+0.08MPFront CameraResolution8MPNetwork & AMP; ConnectivitySIMNano-SIMNetwork2G, 3G, 4GBatteryTypeLi-Po 5200mAhFast Charging15W First ChargingWarranty InformationWarranty12 MonthDescriptionRedmi A5 (6/128GB)The Redmi A5 (6/128GB) is the perfect smartphone for those who want a great combination of performance and affordability. With a massive 6.88-inch display, smooth 120Hz refresh rate, and a powerful 6GB RAM, this phone ensures an optimal experience for everyday tasks, gaming, and media consumption. Whether you’re browsing, taking photos, or streaming, the Redmi A5 gives you everything you need without breaking the bank. Available now at Gadget & Gear in Bangladesh, this phone is a solid choice for budget-conscious users who don’t want to compromise on quality.Key Features of Redmi A5The Redmi A5 offers an array of features that are designed to provide value while maintaining a sleek and functional design. Let’s explore some of the top reasons why this phone is the right choice for you.Massive DisplayThe large 6.88-inch IPS LCD display on the Redmi A5 is one of its standout features. Whether you're watching your favorite shows, scrolling through social media, or playing games, the vibrant display brings content to life. With a resolution of 720 x 1640 pixels, the screen delivers decent clarity, and the 120Hz refresh rate ensures that scrolling and navigating through apps is incredibly smooth. Perfect for those who love a large screen experience without the high price tag.Reliable PerformancePowered by the Unisoc T7250 chipset, the Redmi A5 handles day-to-day tasks effortlessly. details.description_text: Display: 6.67” HD+ IPS Punch Hole Sunlight Display, 120Hz refresh rate, 700 nits brightness Processor: MediaTek Helio G81 Octa-Core RAM/Storage: 4GB RAM, 128GB ROM Rear Camera: 13MP Front Camera: 8MP Battery: 6000mAh with 18W fast charging Operating System: Android 15 Audio: DTS Dual Stereo Speakers Build: IP64 dust & water resistance, 1.5M drop resistance Security: Side-mounted fingerprint sensor Extras: IR Remote Control, Dual SIM, USB Type-C TECNO Spark 40C (4/128GB)The TECNO Spark 40C (4/128GB) is built to impress, combining style, speed, and standout specs that make everyday use feel extraordinary. Available now at Gadget & Gear, this device is tailored for users who demand smooth multitasking, vibrant visuals, and reliable performance all packed into one sleek design. Unlock your phone in a flash with the side-mounted fingerprint sensor for secure, convenient access. Control your home appliances with the built-in IR remote control, and enjoy the latest OS with Android 15, giving you smoother UI, better privacy features, and improved app optimization.TECNO Spark 40C SpecificationThe TECNO Spark 40C comes with a spacious 6.67-inch HD+ IPS Punch Hole Display that turns every scroll, swipe, or stream into a visually engaging experience. With a 120Hz refresh rate, transitions feel silky-smooth, whether you're gaming, watching content, or browsing social media. Plus, the 700 nits peak brightness ensures your screen stays perfectly visible, even under direct sunlight.Display: 6.67” HD+ IPS Punch Hole Sunlight Display, 120Hz refresh rate, 700 nits brightnessProcessor: MediaTek Helio G81 Octa-CoreRAM/Storage: 4GB RAM, 128GB ROMRear Camera: 13MPFront Camera: 8MPBattery: 6000mAh with 18W fast chargingOperating System: Android 15Audio: DTS Dual Stereo SpeakersBuild: IP64 dust & water resistance, 1.5M drop resistanceSecurity: Side-mounted fingerprint sensorExtras: IR Remote Control, Dual SIM, USB Type-CPowered by PerformanceUnder the hood, the Helio G81 chipset ensures the Spark 40C handles daily tasks with ease. Whether you’re multitasking, switching between apps, or playing light to mid-range games, the Octa-Core CPU delivers responsive and energy-efficient performance. Paired with 4GB RAM and 128GB internal storage, you get the space and speed you need without compromise.Reliable CamerasThe 13MP rear camera is designed to help you shoot clear and vibrant photos, even in tricky lighting. Flip to the front and the 8MP selfie camera makes sure your video calls and selfies are always Instagram-worthy. Whether it's daytime or evening, the camera system is optimized for social sharing and daily snaps.Battery with Fast ChargingBattery life is one of the strongest points of the TECNO Spark 40C. With a 6000mAh battery, you’re covered for long workdays, video calls, streaming sessions, and everything in between. And when it's time to recharge, the 18W fast charging via USB Type-C helps you get back on the move quickly.Speakers & Drop ResistanceEnjoy an immersive sound experience with DTS Dual Stereo Speakers, offering crisp audio whether you’re watching a movie, gaming, or just listening to music. This isn’t just loud—it’s rich, clear, and dynamic. The TECNO Spark 40C is not just smart it’s tough. With IP64 dust and water resistance, and a 1.5m drop resistance, you get peace of mind even in unpredictable situations. It’s built to keep up with your lifestyle.

For any feedback, please reach out to the seller. iPhone 17 Pro Full DescriptionThe iPhone 17 Pro represents the pinnacle of Apple’s innovation, bringing together elegant design, cutting-edge performance, and advanced camera technology. Crafted with a refined aluminum alloy frame and protected by the new Ceramic Shield 2, it combines strength and sophistication while remaining slim and lightweight. With 5G support across global bands, ultra-fast performance from the Apple A19 Pro chip, and breakthrough imaging capabilities, the iPhone 17 Pro is built for those who demand the very best.OverviewThe 6.3-inch LTPO Super Retina XDR OLED display delivers breathtaking visuals with a 120Hz refresh rate, HDR10, Dolby Vision, and peak brightness up to 3000 nits for unmatched clarity even under direct sunlight. Powered by iOS 26 and the 3nm Apple A19 Pro chipset, it ensures smooth multitasking, console-level gaming, and professional-grade editing on the go. Storage options range up to 1TB, paired with 12GB RAM, providing ample space and seamless performance for both everyday use and demanding workflows.Photography and videography reach new heights with the advanced triple 48MP camera system, featuring wide, ultrawide, and periscope telephoto lenses with up to 4x optical zoom. The addition of a TOF 3D LiDAR scanner enhances depth mapping and low-light performance, while video recording supports 4K up to 120fps, ProRes RAW, Dolby Vision HDR, Apple Log 2, and even immersive 3D spatial video. The front-facing 18MP multi-aspect camera with OIS and ProRes support ensures professional-quality selfies and video calls.The iPhone 17 Pro also introduces faster and more reliable connectivity, supporting Wi-Fi 7, Bluetooth 6.0, GPS with multi-band systems including NavIC, and emergency satellite communication. A robust battery ensures all-day power, supported by fast 50% charging in just 20 minutes with wired PD2.0 or 30 minutes with MagSafe/Qi2 wireless charging.Key Features 6.3-inch LTPO Super Retina XDR OLED with 120Hz refresh rate, HDR10, and Dolby VisionApple A19 Pro chipset with 12GB RAM and up to 1TB storageTriple 48MP pro camera system with periscope telephoto and 3D LiDAR scanner18MP multi-aspect front camera with OIS, Dolby Vision HDR, and ProRes RAWAdvanced video capabilities including 4K 120fps, Apple Log 2, and spatial videoDual-SIM options with global 5G band support including mmWave (USA)Rugged build with Ceramic Shield 2, IP68 water resistance, and anti-reflective coatingWi-Fi 7, Bluetooth 6.0, USB-C 3.2 Gen 2 with DisplayPort supportAll-day battery with fast wired and wireless charging, plus reverse wired chargingAvailable in Silver, Cosmic Orange, and Deep Blue

It was released in 2024, May. Motorola Edge 50 Fusion has 6.7 inch, P-OLED, 120Hz (LATAM), 144Hz (INT), 1600 nits (peak), a resolution of 1080 x 2400 pixels screen with Corning Gorilla Glass 5 – unconfirmed. It uses Qualcomm SM7435-AB Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 (4 nm) – International Qualcomm SM6450 Snapdragon 6 Gen 1 (4 nm) – LATAM chipset, Octa-core (4×2.40 GHz Cortex-A78 & 4×1.95 GHz Cortex-A55) – International Octa-core (4×2.2 GHz Cortex-A78 & 4×1.8 GHz Cortex-A55) – LATAM CPU, Adreno 710 GPU. It supports 2G, 3G, 4G, 5G networks with Nano-SIM, eSIM or Dual SIM (Nano-SIM, dual stand-by). It has 5MP Dual main camera, 32MP Single selfie camera. It uses 5000 mAh, non-removable battery.Display:6.7 inches P-OLED capacitive Touchscreen, 1B colors supported punch-hole display phone has a resolution of 1080 x 2400 pixels, with a PPI of 393.Body and sensors:Made of the glass front, silicone polymer back (eco leather), and plastic frame. The mobile is available in 3 colors on the market. The colors are Forest Blue, Marshmallow Blue & Hot Pink. It is an accelerometer, gyro, proximity, and compass sensor. The under display, optical fingerprint runs quite accurately fast. Face unlock is correct & secured.Network:The phone has supported 2G, 3G, 4G, and 5G Network facilities. Moreover, GPRS and EDGE facilities also have. HSPA 42.2/5.76 Mbps, LTE-A, 5G speed on the phone.Performance:International:Android 14 Operating system and Qualcomm SM7435-AB Snapdragon 7s Gen 2 (4 nm), Octa-core (4×2.40 GHz Cortex-A78 & 4×1.95 GHz Cortex-A55) processor on the phone.LATAM:Android 14 Operating system and Qualcomm SM6450 Snapdragon 6 Gen 1 (4 nm), Octa-core (4×2.2 GHz Cortex-A78 & 4×1.8 GHz Cortex-A55) processor on the phone.RAM and ROM:The company has launched the phone in 4 variants of 8GB/128GB, 8GB/256GB, 12GB/256GB & 12GB/512GB. In the case of gaming, graphics, and RAM are fairly good. Full HD-quality graphics games can be easily run and played quite smoothly.Camera:The Back of the phone has a 50MP+13MP with which you can record beautiful quality pictures and a maximum of 4K@30fps video.On the front, a 32MP selfie camera with which you can take beautiful quality pictures and selfies. You can record a maximum of 1080@30fps video with the front camera. High–quality selfie work can be done effortlessly with the camera on the phone.Battery:The Motorola Edge 50 Fusion mobile uses a non-removable Li-Po 5000 mAh battery. With this you can get an average of up to 114 hours of standby time, and 15 hours of net browsing. At full charge, you can talk for up to 36 hours on 3G. The phone will take up to 35 minutes with 68W Fast charging to fully charge.

CDMA 800 / 1900 3G Bands: HSDPA 850 / 900 / 1700(AWS) / 1900 / 2100; CDMA2000 1xEV-DO 4G Bands: LTE 5G Bands: SA/NSA/Sub6 (International); SA/NSA/Sub6/mmWave (USA) DisplaySize: 6.9 inches, 115.6 cm² (~90.7% screen-to-body ratio) Type: LTPO Super Retina XDR OLED, 120Hz, HDR10, Dolby Vision, 1000 nits (typ), 1600 nits (HBM), 3000 nits (peak) Resolution: 1320 × 2868 pixels, 19.5:9 ratio (~460 ppi density) ProcessorCPU: Hexa-core GPU: Apple GPU (6-core graphics) Chipset: Apple A19 Pro (3 nm) MemoryInternal Storage Options: 256GB 12GB RAM, 512GB 12GB RAM, 1TB 12GB RAM, 2TB 12GB RAM Card Slot: No Main CameraTriple Setup:48 MP, f/1.6, 24mm (wide), 1/1.28", 1.22µm, dual pixel PDAF, sensor-shift OIS 48 MP, f/2.8, 100mm (periscope telephoto), 1/2.55", 0.7µm, PDAF, 3D sensor-shift OIS, 4x optical zoom 48 MP, f/2.2, 13mm, 120˚ (ultrawide), 1/2.55", 0.7µm, PDAF TOF 3D LiDAR scanner (depth) Video: 4K@24/25/30/60/100/120fps, 1080p@25/30/60/120/240fps, 10-bit HDR, Dolby Vision HDR (up to 60fps), ProRes, ProRes RAW, Apple Log 2, 3D (spatial) video/audio, stereo sound recording Features: Dual-LED dual-tone flash, HDR (photo/panorama) Selfie CameraSingle: 18 MP multi-aspect, f/1.9 (wide), PDAF, OIS; SL 3D (depth/biometrics sensor) Video: 4K@24/25/30/60fps, 1080p@25/30/60/120fps, gyro-EIS Features: HDR, Dolby Vision HDR, 3D spatial audio, stereo sound recording, ProRes RAW, Apple Log 2 Operating SystemiOS 26 ConnectivityNFC: Yes USB: USB Type-C 3.2 Gen 2, DisplayPort Radio: No Wi-Fi: Wi-Fi 802.11 a/b/g/n/ac/6e/7, tri-band, hotspot Bluetooth: 6.0, A2DP, LE 3.5mm Jack: No FeaturesSensors: Face ID, accelerometer, gyro, proximity, compass, barometer Additional: Ultra Wideband (UWB) gen2 chip, Emergency SOS via satellite, Messages and Find My via satellite BatteryType:Li-Ion 4832 mAh (Nano-SIM model) Charging:Wired, PD2.0, 50% in 20 min 25W wireless (MagSafe), 50% in 30 min 15W wireless (MagSafe) – China only 25W wireless (Qi2) 4.5W reverse wired
